appPreview.previewAlt: Magellan app preview with interactive map

about.title: Our story
about.subtitle: Reinventing exploration and memory creation
about.paragraph1: Magellan was born from a simple idea: to transform every journey into a richer, smoother, and more memorable experience. Our belief? Travel is not just about moving from place to place. It's a moment of emotion, discovery, connection. An adventure that deserves to be understoodâ€”and sharedâ€”differently.
about.paragraph2: Thanks to generative artificial intelligence, Magellan becomes the essential tool for modern travelers: an app capable of enriching every stage of the journey, effortlessly organizing memories, and automatically telling living, authentic, and personalized stories.
about.paragraph3: Our core value: making every journey an enriched cultural exploration, while simplifying the creation of captivating and shareable memories.

genesis.title: The genesis: the day it all began
genesis.paragraph1: It all started with a trip to Morocco. With a friend, we wandered through villages, medinas, alleys steeped in history... but paradoxically, we found no clear information about the places we were visiting.
genesis.paragraph2: So a question arose: what if a simple photo could tell us the story of the world around us?
genesis.paragraph3: What if, by capturing a monument, a scene of life, or a landscape, AI could instantly offer us its precise description, its little-known anecdotes, its historical context, nearby recommendations, and even ideas to enrich our travel journal?
genesis.paragraph4: This ideaâ€”born on a bustling square in Marrakechâ€”became the cornerstone of Magellan. Since that day, our ambition has remained the same: to give every traveler the power to explore, understand, and share the world like never before.
